description: This is a web page implementing a demo interface for the ai-rag-lite project, showcasing custom embedding, in-memory store, and a language model in a browser environment. It includes UI elements for document ingestion and querying, along with JavaScript code that initializes and interacts with the RAG components.

methods.name: toyEmbedder
methods.description: A simple embedding function that converts text into a fixed-dimensional vector for demo purposes.

methods.name: rag.ingest
methods.description: Method to ingest a document into the RAG store.

methods.name: rag.query
methods.description: Method to query the RAG system with a question.
